ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: No explicit access control on depositFunds or withdrawFunds functions, which allows any user to call them.
ImplementedSecurityControls.WithdrawalLimit: The contract enforces a 1 ether withdrawal limit per transaction.
ImplementedSecurityControls.TimeLock: The withdrawFunds function restricts withdrawals to a minimum 1-week interval for each user.

FallbackFunctionality.Description: No specific fallback function implemented in the contract.
